{
    "session": "{{session}}",
    "id": 1,
    "method": "update",
    "params": [
        {
            "url": "pm/config/adom/{{adom}}/obj/firewall/profile-protocol-options/default",
            "data": {
                "comment": "All default services.",
                "name": "default",
                "replacemsg-group": null,
                "http": {
                    "ports": [
                        80
                    ],
                    "inspect-all": 1,
                    "status": 1,
                    "scan-bzip2": 1,
                    "address-ip-rating": 1,
                    "block-page-status-code": 403,
                    "comfort-amount": 1,
                    "comfort-interval": 10,
                    "h2c": 0,
                    "options": 0,
                    "oversize-limit": 10,
                    "post-lang": 0,
                    "proxy-after-tcp-handshake": 0,
                    "range-block": 0,
                    "retry-count": 0,
                    "ssl-offloaded": 0,
                    "stream-based-uncompressed-limit": 0,
                    "streaming-content-bypass": 1,
                    "strip-x-forwarded-for": 0,
                    "switching-protocols": 0,
                    "tcp-window-maximum": 8388608,
                    "tcp-window-minimum": 131072,
                    "tcp-window-size": 262144,
                    "tcp-window-type": 3,
                    "tunnel-non-http": 1,
                    "uncompressed-nest-limit": 12,
                    "uncompressed-oversize-limit": 10,
                    "unknown-content-encoding": 1,
                    "unknown-http-version": 2,
                    "verify-dns-for-policy-matching": 1
                }
            },
            "revision note": "Allow HTTP non-standard ports"
        }
    ]
}
